class.name: SGArea2D
class.brief_description: 2D area for detection of other areas and physics bodies.
class.description: 2D area that can detect overlapping [SGCollisionObject2D]s or other [SGArea2D]s.

method.name: get_overlapping_area_collisions
method.description: Returns a list of [SGAreaCollision2D]s for the overlapping [SGArea2D]s.

method.name: get_overlapping_area_count
method.description: Returns the number of overlapping [SGArea2D]s. If you only need the count, this method is somewhat faster than counting the elements in the array returned by [method get_overlapping_areas].

method.name: get_overlapping_bodies
method.description: Returns a list of overlapping [SGStaticBody2D]s and [SGKinematicBody2D]s.

method.name: get_overlapping_body_collisions
method.description: Returns a list of [SGAreaCollision2D]s for the overlapping [SGStaticBody2D]s and [SGKinematicBody2D]s.

method.name: get_overlapping_body_count
method.description: Returns the number of overlapping [SGStaticBody2D]s and [SGKinematicBody2D]s. If you only need the count, this method is somewhat faster than counting the elements in the array returned by [method get_overlapping_bodies].
